query:
UPDATE storage_locations
            SET
                location_code = $3,
                location_type = $4,
                zone = $5,
                aisle = $6,
                rack = $7,
                level = $8,
                position = $9,
                capacity = $10,
                current_stock = $11,
                is_active = $12,
                is_quarantine = $13,
                is_picking_location = $14,
                length_cm = $15,
                width_cm = $16,
                height_cm = $17,
                weight_limit_kg = $18,
                updated_by = $19,
                updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND location_id = $2 AND deleted_at IS NULL
